data.eml:eml: Protoblepharon mccoskeri, a new flashlight fish from eastern Taiwan (Teleostei: Anomalopidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Johnson, David (2012): Protoblepharon mccoskeri, a new flashlight fish from eastern Taiwan (Teleostei: Anomalopidae). Zootaxa 3479: 77-87, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212880
